Class FlappyBird

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
MovingImage
FlappyBird
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class FlappyBird
extends MovingImage
FlappyBird is moving image that represents the flappy bird, which can move up or down, lose stamina over a period of time, and gain stamina by eating food
Author:
sprihapandey
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • FlappyBird

      public FlappyBird​(double x, double y)
      Constructs a flappy bird with given coordinates and a stamina of 10
      Parameters:
      x - The x - coordinate of the top left corner of the bird
      y - The y - coordinate of the top left corner of the bird

  • Method Details

    • flap

      public void flap()
      Moves the bird 5 units up

    • dive

      public void dive()
      Moves the bird 5 units down

    • act

      public void act​(java.util.ArrayList<Food> food, java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles)
      Decreases the stamina of the bird, and increases it if the bird collides with a food object. Moves the bird out of the screen if it loses all of its stamina or if it intersects the bottom edge of the screen
      Parameters:
      food - The list of food objects on the screen
      obstacles - The list of obstacles on the screen

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Draws the bird and displays its stamina on the given PApplet
      Overrides:
      draw in class MovingImage
      Parameters:
      p - The PApplet on which the bird is drawn
